summary: The customer was unhappy with their bill, as they had been charged for a streaming product that they did not order. The customer service agent explained what the streaming product was and how it was billed, and informed the customer that they could cancel the streaming product within 14 days of subscribing to receive a full refund. The customer reluctantly agreed to cancel the streaming product and receive a refund, but expressed their frustration at having to pay for something they didn't order. The customer service agent apologized for any inconvenience and asked if there was anything else they could help with.
